contentrichtext.text: [[File:Xesús Ferro Ruibal.jpg|thumb|Xesús Ferro Ruibal]] '''Xesús Ferro Ruibal''' ([[Moraña]], 1944) is a theologian, Latinist and writer from [[Galicia (Spain)|Galicia]]. He is a member of the [[Real Academia Galega]] and he helped translate [[Bible]] to [[Galician language|Galician]]. He works nowadays in a [[phraseology]] project of [[CIRP|Centro Ramón Piñeiro para a Investigación en Humanidades]], where he publishes his logs often. ==Works== *''Dido e Eneas.
